object.name: InlineQueryResultContact
object.description:
Represents a contact with a phone number. By default, this contact will be sent by the user. Alternatively, you can use input_message_content to send a message with the specified content instead of the contact.
Note: This will only work in Telegram versions released after 9 April, 2016. Older clients will ignore them.
object.html_description:
Represents a contact with a phone number. By default, this contact will be sent by the user. Alternatively, you can use input_message_content to send a message with the specified content instead of the contact.

Note: This will only work in Telegram versions released after 9 April, 2016. Older clients will ignore them.
object.rst_description:
Represents a contact with a phone number. By default, this contact will be sent by the user. Alternatively, you can use *input_message_content* to send a message with the specified content instead of the contact.
**Note:** This will only work in Telegram versions released after 9 April, 2016. Older clients will ignore them.

annotations.description: Type of the result, must be contact
annotations.rst_description: Type of the result, must be *contact*
annotations.name: type

annotations.description: Unique identifier for this result, 1-64 Bytes
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier for this result, 1-64 Bytes
annotations.name: id

annotations.description: Additional data about the contact in the form of a vCard, 0-2048 bytes
annotations.html_description: Optional. Additional data about the contact in the form of a vCard, 0-2048 bytes
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Additional data about the contact in the form of a `vCard <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/VCard>`_, 0-2048 bytes
annotations.name: vcard

annotations.description: Inline keyboard attached to the message
annotations.name: reply_markup

annotations.description: Content of the message to be sent instead of the contact
annotations.html_description: Optional. Content of the message to be sent instead of the contact
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Content of the message to be sent instead of the contact
annotations.name: input_message_content

annotations.description: Url of the thumbnail for the result
annotations.html_description: Optional. Url of the thumbnail for the result
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. Url of the thumbnail for the result
annotations.name: thumbnail_url
